00019   // First, we get the parameters of the medium
00020   // This is: 1st = mu, 2nd = temperature, 3rd = gluon mass, 4th = gluon mean free path
00021   // Here, we only need the gluon mass
00022   // the zDist will need the others
00023   ReturnedParamsDouble = params_.GetParametersDouble( "@mediumParams" );
00024   _mg = ReturnedParamsDouble[2];
00025 
00026   // Next, get the jet flavour
00027   ReturnedParamsString = params_.GetParametersString( "@jetFlavour" );
00028   std::string jetFlavour = ReturnedParamsString.front();
00029   if ( jetFlavour == "Gluon" )
00030   {
00031     _cr = 3.; _mass = _mg;
00032   }
00033   else if ( jetFlavour == "Light" )
00034   {
00035     _cr = 4./3.; _mass = _mg / sqrt(2);
00036   }
00037   else if ( jetFlavour == "Charm" )
00038   {
00039     _cr = 4./3.; _mass = 1.2;
00040   }
00041   else if ( jetFlavour == "Bottom" )
00042   {
00043     _cr = 4./3.; _mass = 4.75;
00044   }
00045   else
00046   {
00047     std::cerr << "@jetFlavour not understood" << std::endl;
00048     exit(0);
00049   }
00050 
00051   // Now, check whether also specifying a jet mass
00052   ReturnedParamsDouble = params_.GetParametersDouble( "@jetMassDirect" );
00053   if ( ReturnedParamsDouble.size() > 0 )
00054     _mass = ReturnedParamsDouble[0];
00055   
00056   // Now, the momentum, to give the jet energy
00057   ReturnedParamsDouble = params_.GetParametersDouble( "@jetMomentum" );
00058   double jetMomentum = ReturnedParamsDouble[0];
00059   // Now calculate and set energy, and mass
00060   _en = sqrt( _mass*_mass + jetMomentum*jetMomentum );
00061 
00062   // The jet path length in the medium
00063   ReturnedParamsDouble = params_.GetParametersDouble( "@pathLength" );
00064   _length = ReturnedParamsDouble[0];
00065 
00066   // The setting on the k max
00067   ReturnedParamsLong = params_.GetParametersLong( "@limitSet" );
00068   _switchkmax = ReturnedParamsLong[0];
00069 
00070   // The strong coupling, alpha_s
00071   ReturnedParamsString = params_.GetParametersString( "@alpha" );
00072   it = ReturnedParamsString.begin();
00073   if ( *it == "fixed" )
00074   {
00075     ++it;
00076     _alphas = boost::lexical_cast<double>( *it );
00077   }
00078   else
00079   {
00080     std::cerr << "Radcalcer, @alpha not understood";
00081     std::cerr << std::endl;
00082     exit(0);
00083   }
00084 
00085   ReturnedParamsString = params_.GetParametersString( "@incClassicalDiffusion" );
00086   if ( ReturnedParamsString.front() == "yes" )
00087     _diffexclude = false;
00088   else if ( ReturnedParamsString.front() == "no" )
00089     _diffexclude = true;
00090   else
00091   {
00092     std::cerr << "Radcalcer, @incClassicalDiffusion not understood as yes or no";
00093     std::cerr << std::endl;
00094     exit(0);
00095   }

00097 
00098   _correlated = correlated_;
